title: House in Boralasgamuwa 01
details:
The most valuable and affordable property which you can obtain from the heart of the Boralesgamuwa city.

This is a highly developed and luxurious housing scheme with in a gated community which gives you the security as well as privacy with all the facilities including open garden, security protected entrance, electricity, water etc. The prices are really affordable when considering with the area and development standard of the projec
